snippet.title: Animated Short [Lament of the Fallen] Japanese Dub Version - Honkai Impact 3rd
snippet.description:
Lightning tore our past asunder,
and our paths were rent and split.
Once the thunders lose voice, and the storms are wept dry,
I’ll enter the darkness and return you to bliss.

※This animated short is a production of miHoYo Anime. Featured Valkyrie theme "Houkai Sekai no Utahime (Honkai World Diva)" is created by in-house music team HOYO-MiX and performed by Mika Kobayashi.

Subscribe our YouTube and turn on notification for latest video : http://bit.ly/HonkaiImpact3rdYTB 

Visit Honkai Impact 3rd Official Website:
https://honkaiimpact3.mihoyo.com/global/ 

Join Official Discord Server:
https://discord.gg/hi3

Find our latest manga

#HonkaiImpact3rd #miHoYo
